text:
Invoking a CGI script (such as a perl script) causes a blank command window to 
popup on the Win2K console.  This behavior is different from that of 1.3 on 
Win2K, but is similar to 1.3 on Win98.  Since our application is based on CGI 
scripts, having blank windows popping up for each click in the browser makes 
the application unusable.
creator: qwan@seatab.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Services really shouldn't run in a console in the first place.

Install and start Apache as a service as a workaround.  Leaving
this report open for resolution.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: This should be fixed in the 2.0.37 release of Apache.
